attributes.action: Pay NHS frontline workers in line with how much we appreciate their work.
attributes.background: Clap for Heroes has once again started the conversation about frontline NHS workers getting paid a wage in line with how much we appreciate them. Alongside clapping at 8pm on a Thursday, sign and share this petition on your social channels to call for a debate around NHS funding and pay.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151

We should increase the pay of our NHS staff by 25%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563356
